Convert offset string: "[+/-]HHMM" or offset value in hours: +16, -5.5, to timezone location strings

Matched locations can be filtered by country name, city name or region code

timezone.to_location(input, country_or_city = NULL)

Examples

# Using offset value
timezone.to_location(+8)
#>  [1] "Antarctica/Casey"  "Australia/Perth"   "Asia/Brunei"      
#>  [4] "Asia/Shanghai"     "Asia/Hong_Kong"    "Asia/Jakarta"     
#>  [7] "Asia/Pontianak"    "Asia/Makassar"     "Asia/Ulaanbaatar" 
#> [10] "Asia/Hovd"         "Asia/Choibalsan"   "Asia/Macau"       
#> [13] "Asia/Kuala_Lumpur" "Asia/Kuching"      "Asia/Manila"      
#> [16] "Asia/Novosibirsk"  "Asia/Barnaul"      "Asia/Tomsk"       
#> [19] "Asia/Novokuznetsk" "Asia/Krasnoyarsk"  "Asia/Irkutsk"     
#> [22] "Asia/Chita"        "Asia/Yakutsk"      "Asia/Khandyga"    
#> [25] "Asia/Ust-Nera"     "Asia/Singapore"    "Asia/Dili"        
#> [28] "Asia/Taipei"       "Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh" 

# If filtered by region code
timezone.to_location(+8, country_or_city = "HK")
#> [1] "Asia/Hong_Kong"

# If filtered by country name
timezone.to_location(+8, country_or_city = "Vietnam")
#> [1] "Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh"

# If filtered by city name
timezone.to_location(+8, country_or_city = "Shanghai")
#> [1] "Asia/Shanghai"

# Using offset string
timezone.to_location("-0500")
#>  [1] "America/Eirunepe"               "America/Rio_Branco"            
#>  [3] "America/Nassau"                 "America/Belize"                
#>  [5] "America/Moncton"                "America/Toronto"               
#>  [7] "America/Nipigon"                "America/Thunder_Bay"           
#>  [9] "America/Iqaluit"                "America/Pangnirtung"           
#> [11] "America/Atikokan"               "America/Winnipeg"              
#> [13] "America/Rainy_River"            "America/Resolute"              
#> [15] "America/Rankin_Inlet"           "America/Cambridge_Bay"         
#> [17] "America/Yellowknife"            "America/Santiago"              
#> [19] "Pacific/Easter"                 "America/Bogota"                
#> [21] "America/Costa_Rica"             "America/Havana"                
#> [23] "America/Santo_Domingo"          "America/Guayaquil"             
#> [25] "Pacific/Galapagos"              "America/Guatemala"             
#> [27] "America/Tegucigalpa"            "America/Port-au-Prince"        
#> [29] "America/Jamaica"                "America/Cayman"                
#> [31] "America/Mexico_City"            "America/Cancun"                
#> [33] "America/Merida"                 "America/Monterrey"             
#> [35] "America/Matamoros"              "America/Chihuahua"             
#> [37] "America/Ojinaga"                "America/Bahia_Banderas"        
#> [39] "America/Managua"                "America/Panama"                
#> [41] "America/Lima"                   "America/El_Salvador"           
#> [43] "America/Grand_Turk"             "America/New_York"              
#> [45] "America/Detroit"                "America/Kentucky/Louisville"   
#> [47] "America/Kentucky/Monticello"    "America/Indiana/Indianapolis"  
#> [49] "America/Indiana/Vincennes"      "America/Indiana/Winamac"       
#> [51] "America/Indiana/Marengo"        "America/Indiana/Petersburg"    
#> [53] "America/Indiana/Vevay"          "America/Chicago"               
#> [55] "America/Indiana/Tell_City"      "America/Indiana/Knox"          
#> [57] "America/Menominee"              "America/North_Dakota/Center"   
#> [59] "America/North_Dakota/New_Salem" "America/North_Dakota/Beulah"   

# If filtered by region code
timezone.to_location("-0500", country_or_city = "US")
#>  [1] "America/New_York"               "America/Detroit"               
#>  [3] "America/Kentucky/Louisville"    "America/Kentucky/Monticello"   
#>  [5] "America/Indiana/Indianapolis"   "America/Indiana/Vincennes"     
#>  [7] "America/Indiana/Winamac"        "America/Indiana/Marengo"       
#>  [9] "America/Indiana/Petersburg"     "America/Indiana/Vevay"         
#> [11] "America/Chicago"                "America/Indiana/Tell_City"     
#> [13] "America/Indiana/Knox"           "America/Menominee"             
#> [15] "America/North_Dakota/Center"    "America/North_Dakota/New_Salem"
#> [17] "America/North_Dakota/Beulah"
